remarks: Value of the function in ~ qusval .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Feb-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2015.)
statement:
ercpbl.r $e |- ( ph -> .~ Er V ) $.
ercpbl.v $e |- ( ph -> V e. _V ) $.
ercpbl.f $e |- F = ( x e. V |-> [ x ] .~ ) $.
divsfval $p |- ( ph -> ( F ` A ) = [ A ] .~ ) $.
$d .~ x $.
$d A x $.
$d V x $.
$d ph x $.
